task_title: Review Phase 4: US2 OIDC Authentication with Storage State (T028-T047)
task_requirements:
Review the Auth System module implementation.

**Files to Review in core/typescript/auth/:**
- types.ts, credentials.ts, storage-state.ts
- providers/base.ts, providers/oidc.ts, providers/form.ts, providers/token.ts, providers/custom.ts
- oidc/flow.ts, oidc/providers/*.ts
- setup-factory.ts, index.ts
- __tests__/*.test.ts

**Validation:**
- FR-006 to FR-011 compliance
- 436/436 tests passing
- Proper OIDC flow with MFA support
- Storage state persistence and cleanup
